channel.title: Help with Frames
channel.description: I tried to find Lothy's tut on frames but i think it was deleted... So can anyone tell me the frames for Laugh and Cheer?

item.title: Help with Frames
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

they are cases

break; case 164: // bow emote startAnimation(0x35A); break; case 165: // angry emote startAnimation(0x35B); break; case 161: // cry emote startAnimation(0x35C); break; case 170: // laugh emote startAnimation(0x35D); break; case 171: // cheer emote startAnimation(0x35E); break; case 163: // wave emote startAnimation(0x35F); break; case 167: // beckon emote startAnimation(0x360); break; case 172: // clap emote startAnimation(0x361); break; case 166: // dance emote startAnimation(0x362); break; case 52050: // panic emote startAnimation(0x839); break; case 52051: // jig emote startAnimation(0x83A); break; case 52052: // spin emote startAnimation(0x83B); break; case 52053: // headbang emote startAnimation(0x83C); break; case 52054: //joy jump emote startAnimation(0x83D); break; case 52055: // rasp' berry emote startAnimation(0x83E); break; case 52056: // yawn emote startAnimation(0x83F); break; case 52057: // salute emote startAnimation(0x840); break; case 52058: // shrug emote startAnimation(0x841); break; case 43092: // blow kiss emote startAnimation(0x558); break; case 2155: // glass box emote startAnimation(0x46B); break; case 25103: // climb rope emote startAnimation(0x46A); break; case 25106: // lean emote startAnimation(0x469); break; case 2154: // glass wall emote startAnimation(0x468); break; case 52071: // goblin bow emote startAnimation(0x84F); break; case 52072: // goblin dance emote startAnimation(0x850); break;

to edit colours add this void

        public void somthing() {
        //----Player Controls----
	sendQuest("@whi@Player Controls", 154);
	
	sendQuest("@whi@Move speed", 158);
	sendQuest("@whi@Walk", 160);
	sendQuest("@whi@Run", 159);

	
	sendQuest("@whi@Energy left:", 148);
	sendQuest("@whi@Auto retaliate", 155);
	sendQuest("@whi@On", 157);
	sendQuest("@whi@Off", 156);
	
	sendQuest("@dre@Emote animations", 174);
	sendQuest("@blu@Home", 180);
	sendQuest("@gre@Jad", 181);
	sendQuest("@yel@Barrow", 178);
	sendQuest("@whi@Bow", 175);
	sendQuest("@whi@Angry", 177);
	sendQuest("@whi@Cry", 182);
	sendQuest("@whi@Laugh", 185);
	sendQuest("@whi@Cheer", 186);
	sendQuest("@whi@Wave", 173);
	sendQuest("@whi@Beckon", 179);
	sendQuest("@whi@Clap", 187);
	sendQuest("@whi@Dance", 176);
	sendQuest("@whi@Panic", 13371);
	sendQuest("@whi@Jig", 13372);
	sendQuest("@whi@Spin", 13373);
	sendQuest("@whi@Head", 13374);
	sendQuest("@whi@Bang", 13375);
	sendQuest("@whi@Joy", 13376);
	sendQuest("@whi@Jump", 13377);
	sendQuest("@whi@Rasp'", 13378);
	sendQuest("@whi@berry", 13379);
	sendQuest("@whi@Yawn", 13380);
	sendQuest("@whi@Salute", 13381);
	sendQuest("@whi@Shrug", 13382);
	sendQuest("@whi@Blow", 11102);
	sendQuest("@whi@Kiss", 11103);
	
	sendQuest("@whi@Glass", 6533);
	sendQuest("@whi@Box", 6532);
	sendQuest("@whi@Climb", 6540);
	sendQuest("@whi@Rope", 6541);
	sendQuest("@whi@Lean", 11101);
	sendQuest("@whi@Glass", 6519);
	sendQuest("@whi@Wall", 6522);
	
	sendQuest("@whi@Goblin", 13386);
	sendQuest("@whi@Bow", 13388);
	sendQuest("@whi@Goblin", 13387);
	sendQuest("@whi@Dance", 15170);
	sendQuest("@whi@Scared", 15175);
	sendQuest("@whi@Zombie", 18466);
	sendQuest("@whi@Walk", 18467);
	sendQuest("@whi@Zombie", 18468);
	sendQuest("@whi@Dance", 18469);
}
